nodes.title: Ritual for Determining the Length of One's Life

nodes.body:
• Rdzogs dus go ba'i cho ga
  • Spyan ras gzigs dang ‘jam dpal gyi sgo nas tshe tshad dang rmi lam brtag pa ratna gling pa’i gter ma 
  • See also tshe tshad brtag pa
